note.p: Education: St Peter's College, Cambridge. BA (1795), MA (1798), DD (1816)

Career: Rector of St George, Hanover Square (1803); Chaplain in Ordinary to the King; Vicar of Hillingdon, Middlesex (1810); Chaplain General of the Army; Dean of Carlisle (1820); wrote a biography of Dr Beilby Porteus (1811)
Notes: 'Saml Carlisle' is Samuel Goodenough, Bishop of Carlisle
